A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ok. This wasn't the best Star Wars movie. And by no means was it the worst. I did not know what to think when I saw it initially. After the second viewing\, I had a blast. It is however far from perfect. It suffers from pacing issues\, a major story arc that probably didn't need to be in the movie\, and some plot points that were a little sketchy. \n I loved how the movie took my theories and preconceived notions and took them down completely different paths. Some of the scenes are absolutely stunning. I see the criticisms\, but I had just way to much fun with this movie to give it near a negative rating.
